item.title: OREO & Python
item.description: I found a really funny image on the internet related to oreos. Lets try to emulate this using Python and R!! So basically: RE = Cream O = Cookie O + RE + O = an Oreo sandwich cookie R Code Chunk library(reticulate) OREO <- "OREO" Python Code Chunk I want 4 oreos! cookie = r.OREO print(cookie, cookie, cookie, cookie) ## ('OREO', 'OREO', 'OREO', 'OREO') Letâ€™s separate the top cookie off the rest of the oreo #Python Code Chunk cookie[0] + '&' + ' ' + cookie[1:] ## 'O& REO' I hate the cream!
